div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 12:50 pm CDT

div.span: Mostly sunny, with a high near 64. North northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 33. Northeast wind around 5 mph becoming calm in the evening.
A 20 percent chance of showers after 4pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. Light west wind increasing to 10 to 15 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.
